121.content:
Name: Alex (Call him "Al" to really annoy him)

Species: Skunk-Human Hybrid

Gender: Male

Well, here I am. A mix of the bushy tail and white stripe of a skunk, with the physical features of a human. I am Alex, A failed experiment from the government, set out into the world to test if hybrids can exist in the real world. I'm 13 years old, and in school everyone stayed away from me as a result of my...defect, if you will. This caused me to become a bit psychotic whenever someone ignores me. As a skunk I can spray at will, although only once every few matches: it needs to fuel up, after all. My main weapons are my speed, and my horrendous farts and feet. Although...no one really smells my feet unless I take my shoes off, which is a good thing for them, cause they REEK! Let's see how I can do fighting other hybrids and species...

Feet: Ungodly, but only when I take my shoes off. They're scentless if I have my shoes on.
Farts: Ungodly. What do you expect, I'm a skunk hybrid!
Body Musk: Very bad. I never shower because I gave up after realizing no matter how much I shower, the stench never goes away.
Breath: Okay. I brush my teeth regularly, so what?

Stink resistance: 60 out of 100. Strangely enough, with all the smells emanating off of me, my nose is still fairly sensitive.

Special abilities:

Musky Farts: My farts already have the faint scent of skunk musk, but when I choose to, I can fart out a misty mix of my musk and my farts, a true double assault.

Speedy Speedster: I used to be on the track team In school, and I usually won...maybe because it was because of my smell...but anyways, I can run circles around my opponent as long as they aren't fast.
121.title: Alex the Human-Skunk Hybrid

155231.content:
Character overview:

Appearance- Vile resembles a freakishly tall and thin human with elongated, webbed fingers and toes. Each of these fingers and toes is adorned with a long and thick, but hollow claw that ends in a beveled point. His body oozes a thick, rancid-looking fluid, primarily from his mouth and off of a several foot long tongue, much too big for anything humanoid, but also concentrated in the areas around his hands, feet, armpits, ass, and groin. His skin is sickly pale with an eerie green hue and it always has a faint sheen as if moist or oily.

Height- 8 feet tall, usually hunched with knees bent, bringing him down to a much more modest six and a half feet high.

Weight - despite his height, Vile is remarkably light weight. His durable, lightweight skeleton keeps him at around 150 pounds. He's easy to toss around, but heavy blows do very little unless hes pinned against another solid surface. He's taken a lot of punishment, but never broke a bone to date. Unfortuna

Abilities and tactics: Vile's body is covered in a slick, oily substance that prevents the thick sludge that he excretes from sticking to himself.

Vile constantly secretes a toxic sludge from his body that rapidly causes a powerful physical dependence in his victims. It can effectively make its way into his victim's system through the skin, via mucous membranes, intravenously, or even via digestion. This toxin is secreted from Vile's sweat glands, his hollow claws, and ducts located in the back of his mouth. It's thick, almost mucousy in texture, and adheres to most surfaces. Its scent is every bit as thick as the substance itself; putrid and cloying with undertones of unwashed musk. When freshly secreted, it's thick and sticky. This makes it extremely useful for holding opponents in place while slowly working its way through their skin and into their body.

Due to Vile's near constant exposure to this toxin, it takes monumentous dosages for him to feel any effect. Should it get to him, he displays the same symptoms as his victims. Body temperature rises, sense of touch becomes heightened, heart rate increases and the mind becomes foggy, pliable, and more open to suggestion. As the body burns through the vile ooze, it leaves behind symptoms of terrible withdrawal: cold sweats, unbearable aches, exhaustion, and in extreme cases may result in loss of consciousness or death if the victim does not give in to their need for more.

In short, Vile wants a long fight. The more venom he can secrete, the more control he has over the arena, and the more likely it is the toxins will take effect. At a distance, Vile doesn't have many options. To cover for this, he wants to coat the arena in toxin to slow down his opponent and close the gap. In a cage match, that's less of a problem, Should Vile get the upper hand and stagger his opponent, he's going to ensure they're going stay still by coating them in sludge, and pump them full of toxin until they all but forget who they are and even the slightest touch feels like a blow from a sledge hammer.

Vile's never been one to show mercy and revels in others' pain. Be careful, and good luck.

info.brief_description: There used to be a very popular story titled You vs Who, honor your characters in battle!
info.description:
REMEMBER: WINNERS TAKE DUMPS, LOSERS EAT IT.
That little motto should be a reminder that this fight-thread is nearly no holds barred, almost anything is allowed.

***FREE MEMBERSHIP RAFFLE!!! INFO BELOW***
To any furry/anthro Skunk fighters or fighters who sign up and create a skunk character, and directly attempts to defeat myself, will be entered into a raffle in which once there are enough, say 5 or so, I will put the cruelest, toughest and hard fighting stinky authors into a raffle for a 1 year membership!
ALL SKUNK-HYBRID ENTRIES ARE GUARANTEED 3 MONTHS GIFTED MEMBERSHIP IF THEY WIN THEIR FIGHT.

------------------
This is a revival of the You vs Who story, as such the rules will remain the same as they were. With some adjustments, they are as follows.

Skunk characters will be given a few extra slots at the beginning as they were the most popular characters in the previous series.



--------PLEASE READ ENTIRE INTRODUCTION-------


--- EDIT 2012, BELOW RULES NO LONGER HAVE TO BE FOLLOWED FULLY, If you wish me to step in, send a message; as for now I have decided to let the story go wherever the writers wish, I claim no responsibility for material posted however if one wishes it be removed, I can arrange that, have fun. -----------




There will be many introductory blanks, to see recent posts, click that, if you cannot find new competitor then create your character and wait.

If you are signing on to fight somone who has already posted their character, you CAN NOT make your character stronger than theirs, you must be equal or less, unless otherwise stated in the first poster's chapter.

Rules are; Can either be a Humiliation Match or Strikeout, if you want to chose both, copy and paste your charachters details under both categories.
-Humiliation matches are the only matches you are allowed to give up. However the looser has to do three things the winner demands. Try not to put your character to shame.
-REFEREE: I will be the Referee of all matches, I will respond quickly, if I do not respond within 2 days of a needed response then all rules are forfeit and anything goes. I can be hurt/knocked out, any pins that take place while I am unconscious do not count and are just for the humiliation. When I am unconscious it lasts 5 chapters from the Writer who knocked me out's perspective, so a total of four.
Threatening the Ref to pull things in your direction is encouraged however can only happen if the Ref has declared your enemy to be in the Sluggish Status(Explained Later) for two chapters, if you harass/humiliate/threaten the Ref, your enemy cannot defend him for 3 of your own chapters. My giving in will be judged solely on your writing style, techniques, how bad the consequences for not giving in will be, my own dignity, and like or dislike of writer, so in a nutshell messing with me is a risky move but, you can demand I declare you a winner and if you got me to agree the opponent should be in a sluggish status already then this is your best bet probably. You both can try to get me to give in at the same time, if you fight me I will fight back for how much my character can, you can team up against me and see who I declare winner or call a round two, or anything else you might wanna ask the Ref.

-SLUGGISHNESS; If you as a writer believe your enemy should be senseless and weak due to multiple chapters of heavy pounding, message me, and if you are technically correct for how they really would be feeling, I will decide on allowing them to go into a one to two chapter sluggishness, where all of their attempts to fight can be easily countered, and they are practically defenseless, however can still kick out, except kick out response time is decreased to 2 chapturs of your post with a pin in it. (this is the status your enemy must be in before you can try to humiliate or threaten them into taking your orders.)

-Location; can be anywhere the first poster chooses, the I as the Referee will always be there though.
-NO SELF-DECLARED WINS. If you pin somone, they have a time limit in which they must respond or else they loose, this time limit must be at least two hours. Time things right, everyone sleeps. If one person is already being owned but keeps kicking out, I will declare a winner myself.
-TRY TO WIN. Please create your favorite character and try to win, you shall face other winning competitors or a newbie if you have a win under your belt already. Do not write with intent of loosing.
-Fight for at least 3 to 5 chapters before trying to end the match.
-The readers choices must have at least one where they are allowed to make their own moves to escape yours(Readers Choice). The others are up to the writer of that chapter.
-If a writer successfully kicks out twice, the pinner will have to do one command by the ex-pinned until they can keep fighting. This is to encourage timing your pins well and to contain access pinning. These commands cannot cause the commander to win.
-ABILITIES: Your character can have any abilities they choose, be aware of the first writer's abilities, and be sure to make your own to counter them. If an ability is not stated in the intro page, it cannot be added, unless you win a fight, if you win, you will be allowed to add an ability and also modify your character slightly. Abilities can hender opponents if not properly countered, KO abilities cannot KO enemies unless they do not reply within a time limit of at least one and a half hours or more if you set a time limit after using a KO ability.

Put up your bio, battle choices, and wait for people to battle you!
